information: Arotco is one of the major licorice extract supplier in Euro-Asia region. The products of this company include licorice extracts in the form of spray-dried powder, solid blocks, liquid and granules with different levels of active components according to the customers’ order. Our natural and organic licorice products are exported to international markets. By using both professional methods in packing and a well- organized distribution network, our customer in all over the world are sure that, their orders will reach them safe and in most convenient time. AROTCO is a privately owned company and authorized to do business under the laws of the [Germany]. At Arotco, we are proud to work with motivated people and with the right features. It is our wide range of knowledge, experience and expertise that enables us to assist our clients with the best possible solutions. Our goal is to provide our staff with extensive opportunities to use unique insights to guide our professional processes. We apply our basic principles and policies every day to ensure our customers' demands. Instagram: arotco.licorice Facebook: Arotco Licorice
